panel1.title: Boost your IoT potential
panel1.sentence: Live Objects is the Orange answer to manage your objects and collect, store, secure and process your IoT data.

sdk.title: Prototype easily with our SDK!
sdk.content: A set of SDK compatible with the main prototyping platforms ARM, Arduino and Raspberry. Focus on your service and your users, we take care of the rest!

lorachallenge.title: LoRa® IoT Challenge
lorachallenge.content:
48h to create a LoRa® object or service in Smart-Agri,Smart-Cities or Smart-Mobility.
Live Objects manages devices and data of the Orange LoRa® network.

iotdevicecatalogue.title: IoT Device Catalogue
iotdevicecatalogue.content: Looking for a specific object to develop your IoT project? Or you simply want to know our range of connected objects? Let yourself be guided through our IoT Device Catalogue.

account.title: Need a 3 months discover account?
account.content: You have a project, a question? Contact sales here

features.title: Features
features.content: 3 months free offer limited to 10 devices with data retention.

dataindexation.key:
Full data indexation &
multi criteria complex search

features.lorastar: you need to subscribe to LoRa® offer when available in your country

platform.title: IoT Saas platform for an end to end value proposition
platform.content: SaaS hosting in Europe by Orange.
